channel.title: How to get my server on for other people?
channel.description:
I'd like to get my server online so other people can join. I've no idea how to add it on moparscape or something. I'm using IP-Server : Localhost so maybe that's the problem? and I'm using port : 43595
Well i can get in the server. But how to let join other people?
ty

item.title: How to get my server on for other people?
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

could you help me ?

via teamviewer or something?

Read full topic
item.source: How to get my server on for other people?

item.title: How to get my server on for other people?
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

You can’t use your local host for other people to go on, you need to put your IP. You must have a no-ip of course and you must

port forward. Then change the IP’s in your client and put it up on the Server Status page.

Read full topic
item.source: How to get my server on for other people?
